div.span: This site has been in BETA for 2319 days
SCHOOL CLOSING ALERT UNTIL FRIDAY, MAY 15. (OFFICES ARE CLOSED)

p.span: Get updated information on this website by clicking on the links that follow regarding COVID-19 (
)and our most recent letter to NCSD families

span.p: MEAL PROGRAM: Weekly food deliveries continue onTuesdays (between 11am and 12:30pm). Click on the Food Distribution PDF Link & Formto apply, or contact usvia email at [emailprotected] or by callingfood services at 607-334-1600 ext. 5410.

div.div: District Office: 89 Midland Drive|Norwich, NY 13815 | P: 607.334.1600|F: 607.336.8652

li.a: FAQ for Parents on Grades 3-8 Testing

img.title: Meal Distribution Update
img.span:
Starting Tuesday, April 21, f
rozen food items will be included with the weekly meal deliveries made on NCSD. Storage and heating instructions will be sent along with the delivery. Be sure to check the labels if your child has food allergies.

img.title: BOE Meeting on April 20
img.span:
Join us for our second online Board of Education Meeting from the comfort of your own home. The meeting is scheduled for Monday, April 20, at 6pm.In order to attend the meeting, you will need to use Zoom,a remote video conferencing service available online. To access the meeting, attendees will need to click on the link below orcopy the web address in to your browser's address bar.
Information Needed to Join Zoom Meeting
Web Address to Copy in your Browser:
- https://us04web.zoom.us/j/9028005727?pwd=QlJHamgxckx0TjA2NVpSYnZGVk5yZz09

img.title: NY State of Health Logo
img.span: NY STATE OF HEALTH OFFERS INSURANCE TO FAMILIES

div.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: #ffffff

span.div: As New Yorkers work through these challenging times together, NY State of Health is committed to ensuring access to affordable, quality health insurance to ensure that families will get the care that they need during this state of emergency. The letter to families can be viewed by clicking on the link below:
Link: NY State of Health Letter to Families

Please join us and be a part of Norwich history! Our first online BOE meeting will be held this Wednesday, April 1, at 6pm. In order to attend the meeting, you will use Zoom,an remote video conferencing service available online. Attendees will need to copy the web address listed below to access the meeting.

img.title: MEAL DISTRIBUTION UPDATED 03/20/20
img.span: IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR MEAL DELIVERIES (UPDATED MARCH 20)

span.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: Due to additional restrictions imposed across the state, the NCSD meal delivery schedule has been adjusted. Weekly deliveries will be made only on Tuesdays. The next delivery date, therefore, will be Tuesday, March 24.

img.title: Pick up times for student materials
img.alt: Pick up times for student materials
img.span: PICK UP TIMES FOR LEARNING MATERIALS

Parents and students can pick up student materials on Tuesday, March 17, and Wednesday, March 18, from 11am to 2pm. Please visit each building where you have a son or daughter in enrolled. Staff will be available to direct you to pick up locations and answer your questions. Continue to visit our website over the next several days for updates and helpful materials for the extended school closing.

br.span:
Starting Tuesday, April 21, f
